title: Did the New York Times in 1924 say that Hitler "beats him in prison "?
subtitle: The critics of Donald Trump warned against historical similarities between the American Capitol attack in 2021 and Munich Butch in 1923.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 1924, The New York Times reported that Adolf Hitler's short prison term had been left by "our lining" and "he no longer feared."
